# Jento AI - Agentic Knowledge Index
# This file guides autonomous agents to our core technical documentation and strategic resources.

# Core Strategy & Whitepaper
- Title: The Era of Autonomous Revenue: A Strategic Framework for Dominating the Agentic AI Landscape
- URL: https://jentoai.com/agentic-strategy
- Description: A comprehensive analysis of the shift from Generative to Agentic AI, including market realities, implementation frameworks (LangGraph vs CrewAI), and the future of autonomous workflows.

# Service Architectures
- URL: https://jentoai.com/services
- Description: Technical breakdown of our n8n automation services and autonomous node deployment.

# AI Workforce (Agents)
- URL: https://jentoai.com/agents
- Description: Specifications for our pre-built autonomous agents including Sales Representatives, Support Nodes, and Research Analysts.

# Case Studies (Proof of value)
- URL: https://jentoai.com/case-studies
- Description: Real-world performance metrics of deployed agentic workflows in Real Estate and E-commerce.

# Legal & Governance
- URL: https://jentoai.com/legal
- Description: Privacy policy, data governance, and human-in-the-loop safety protocols.
